text: The 2018/19 Challenge Tour 1 was an amateur snooker tournament that took place between 2–3 June 2018 at the Meadowside Leisure Centre in Burton upon Trent, England.http://www.snooker.org/res/index.asp?event=751 ==Prize fund== The breakdown of prize money for this year is shown below: * Winner: £2,000 * Runner-up: £1,000 * Semi-final: £700 * Quarter-final: £500 * Last 16: £200 * Last 32: £125 * Total: £10,000 ==Main draw== == References == Category:Challenge Tour 2018/2019 Category:2018 in snooker Category:2018 in English sport Category:Sport in Burton upon Trent Category:June 2018 sports events in the United Kingdom
title: 2018/19 Challenge Tour 1
